briefdescription.para: Initial state.
Delivery in progress.
Message successfully delivered and acknowledged by the server.
Message was not delivered.
Message was received and acknowledged but cannot get file from server.
File transfer has been completed successfully.
Message successfully delivered an acknowledged by the remote user.
Message successfully displayed to the remote user.
File transfer is in progress.

detaileddescription.para: If message is incoming it's a download, otherwise it's an upload.

briefdescription.para: LinphoneChatMessageState is used to notify if messages have been successfully delivered or not.
Incoming message.
Outgoing message.
LinphoneChatMessageDirection is used to indicate if a message is outgoing or incoming.
Initial state.
Chat room is now instantiated on local.
One creation request was sent to the server.
Chat room was created on the server.
Chat room creation failed.
Wait for chat room termination.
Chat room exists on server but not in local.
The chat room termination failed.
Chat room was deleted on the server.
LinphoneChatRoomState is used to indicate the current state of a chat room.
No capabilities.
No server.

detaileddescription.para: It's a direct communication

briefdescription.para: Supports RTT.
Use server (supports group chat)
Special proxy chat room flag.
Chat room migratable from Basic to Conference.
A communication between two participants (can be Basic or Conference)
Chat room is encrypted.
Chat room can enable ephemeral messages.
LinphoneChatRoomCapabilities is used to indicate the capabilities of a chat room.
Basic (client-to-client) chat room.
Server-based chat room.
LinphoneChatRoomBackend is used to indicate the backend implementation of a chat room.
No encryption.
Lime x3dh encryption.
LinphoneChatRoomEncryptionBackend is used to indicate the encryption engine used by a chat room.
Each device manages its own ephemeral settings.
Ephemeral settings are chatroom wide and only admins can change them.
LinphoneChatRoomEphemeralMode is used to the ephemeral message mode used by a chat room.
Security failure.
No encryption.
Encrypted.
Encrypted and verified.
TODO move to encryption engine object when available LinphoneChatRoomSecurityLevel is used to indicate the encryption security level of a chat room.
Policy to use to send/receive instant messaging composing/delivery/display notifications.

detaileddescription.para: The sending of this information is done as in the RFCs 3994 (is_composing) and 5438 (imdn delivered/displayed).

briefdescription.para: Call back used to notify message delivery status.
Callback used to notify a reaction has been received or sent for a given message.

parameterdescription.para: the LinphoneChatMessageReaction reaction that was sent or received

briefdescription.para: Callback used to notify a reaction has been removed from a given message.

parameterdescription.para: the LinphoneAddress of the person that removed it's reaction

briefdescription.para: Call back used to notify participant IMDN state.

memberdef.definition: typedef void(* LinphoneChatMessageCbsFileTransferRecvCb) (LinphoneChatMessage *message, LinphoneContent *content, const LinphoneBuffer *buffer)
memberdef.name: LinphoneChatMessageCbsFileTransferRecvCb

briefdescription.para: File transfer receive callback prototype.

detaileddescription.para:
This function is called by the core upon an incoming File transfer is started. This function may be call several time for the same file in case of large file.
message
LinphoneChatMessage message from which the body is received.
content
LinphoneContent incoming content information
buffer
LinphoneBuffer holding the received data. Empty buffer means end of file.

memberdef.definition: typedef LinphoneBuffer *(* LinphoneChatMessageCbsFileTransferSendCb) (LinphoneChatMessage *message, LinphoneContent *content, size_t offset, size_t size)
memberdef.name: LinphoneChatMessageCbsFileTransferSendCb

briefdescription.para: File transfer send callback prototype.

detaileddescription.para:
This function is called by the core when an outgoing file transfer is started. This function is called until size is set to 0.
message
LinphoneChatMessage message from which the body is received.
content
LinphoneContent outgoing content
offset
the offset in the file from where to get the data to be sent
size
the number of bytes expected by the framework
A LinphoneBuffer object holding the data written by the application. An empty buffer means end of file.
The returned value isn't used, hence the deprecation!
Deprecated
17/08/2020 Use LinphoneChatMessageCbsFileTransferSendChunkCb instead.

memberdef.definition: typedef void(* LinphoneChatMessageCbsFileTransferSendChunkCb) (LinphoneChatMessage *message, LinphoneContent *content, size_t offset, size_t size, LinphoneBuffer *buffer)
memberdef.argsstring: )(LinphoneChatMessage *message, LinphoneContent *content, size_t offset, size_t size, LinphoneBuffer *buffer)
memberdef.name: LinphoneChatMessageCbsFileTransferSendChunkCb

briefdescription.para: File transfer send callback prototype.

detaileddescription.para:
This function is called by the core when an outgoing file transfer is started. This function is called until size is set to 0.
message
LinphoneChatMessage message from which the body is received.
content
LinphoneContent outgoing content
offset
the offset in the file from where to get the data to be sent
size
the number of bytes expected by the framework
buffer
A LinphoneBuffer to be filled. Leave it empty when end of file has been reached.

memberdef.definition: typedef void(* LinphoneChatMessageStateChangedCb) (LinphoneChatMessage *message, LinphoneChatMessageState state, void *user_data)
memberdef.name: LinphoneChatMessageStateChangedCb

briefdescription.para: Call back used to notify message delivery status.
An chat message is the object that is sent or received through a LinphoneChatRoom.

detaileddescription.para: To create a LinphoneChatMessage, use linphone_chat_room_create_empty_message(), then either add text using linphone_chat_message_add_utf8_text_content() or a LinphoneContent with file informations using linphone_chat_message_add_file_content(). A valid LinphoneContent for file transfer must contain a type and subtype, the name of the file and it's size. Finally call linphone_chat_message_send() to send it.

To send files through a LinphoneChatMessage, you need to have configured a file transfer server URL with linphone_core_set_file_transfer_server(). On the receiving side, either use linphone_chat_message_download_content() to download received files or enable auto-download in the LinphoneCore using linphone_core_set_max_size_for_auto_download_incoming_files(), -1 disabling the feature and 0 always downloading files no matter it's size.
Keep in mind a LinphoneChatMessage created by a LinphoneChatRoomBackendBasic LinphoneChatRoom can only contain one LinphoneContent, either text or file.

briefdescription.para: A chat message reaction is an emoji sent by someone in the same chat room to react to a specific LinphoneChatMessage.

detaileddescription.para: To create a LinphoneChatMessageReaction, use linphone_chat_message_create_reaction(). Once you are ready, send the reaction using linphone_chat_message_reaction_send().
Reactions are available using linphone_chat_message_get_reactions() and will be notified using dedicated callbacks either in #LinphoneCoreListener or #LinphoneChatMessageListener.

briefdescription.para: An object to handle the callbacks for the handling a LinphoneChatMessage objects.
A chat room is the place where LinphoneChatMessage are exchanged.

detaileddescription.para: To create (or find) a LinphoneChatRoom, you first need a LinphoneChatRoomParams object. A chat room is uniquely identified by it's local and remote SIP addresses, meaning you can only have one chat room between two accounts (unless the backend is LinphoneChatRoomBackendFlexisipChat). Then you can call linphone_core_search_chat_room() or linphone_core_create_chat_room_6().

Be careful as a LinphoneChatRoomBackendFlexisipChat backend LinphoneChatRoom will be created asynchronously, so make sure you add a LinphoneChatRoomCbs to the returned object to be notified when it will be in state LinphoneChatRoomStateCreated.

All chat rooms are loaded from database when the LinphoneCore starts, and you can get them using linphone_core_get_chat_rooms(). This method doesn't return empty chat rooms nor ones for which the local address doesn't match an existing LinphoneProxyConfig identity, unless you specify otherwise in the [misc] section of your configuration file by setting hide_empty_chat_rooms=0 and/or hide_chat_rooms_from_removed_proxies=0.

briefdescription.para: Object defining parameters for a LinphoneChatRoom.

detaileddescription.para: Can be created with linphone_core_create_default_chat_room_params(). You can use linphone_chat_room_params_is_valid() to check if your configuration is valid or not.

If the LinphoneChatRoom backend is LinphoneChatRoomBackendBasic, then no other parameter is required, but LinphoneChatMessage sent and received won't benefit from all features a LinphoneChatRoomBackendFlexisipChat can offer like conversation with multiple participants and a subject, end-to-end encryption, ephemeral messages, etc... but this type is the only one that can interoperate with other SIP clients or with non-flexisip SIP proxies.

briefdescription.para: A mask of LinphoneChatRoomCapabilities.
An object to handle the callbacks for the handling a LinphoneChatRoom objects.
LinphoneChatMessageState is used to notify if messages have been successfully delivered or not.
LinphoneChatMessageDirection is used to indicate if a message is outgoing or incoming.
LinphoneChatRoomState is used to indicate the current state of a chat room.
LinphoneChatRoomCapabilities is used to indicate the capabilities of a chat room.
LinphoneChatRoomBackend is used to indicate the backend implementation of a chat room.
LinphoneChatRoomEncryptionBackend is used to indicate the encryption engine used by a chat room.
LinphoneChatRoomEphemeralMode is used to the ephemeral message mode used by a chat room.
TODO move to encryption engine object when available LinphoneChatRoomSecurityLevel is used to indicate the encryption security level of a chat room.
Returns a list of chat rooms.

simplesect.para: List of chat rooms. LinphoneChatRoom

It is the application responsibility to handle it correctly afterwards.

The content type to add support for

It is the application responsibility to handle it correctly afterwards.

briefdescription.para: Create a client-side group chat room.

detaileddescription.para: When calling this function the chat room is only created at the client-side and is empty. You need to call linphone_chat_room_add_participants() to create at the server side and add participants to it. Also, the created chat room will not be a one-to-one chat room even if linphone_chat_room_add_participants() is called with only one participant.

parameterdescription.para: The subject of the group chat room
Boolean value telling whether we should plan on being able to fallback to a basic chat room if the client-side group chat room creation fails

simplesect.para: The newly created client-side group chat room.

memberdef.argsstring: (LinphoneCore *core, const char *subject, bool_t fallback, bool_t encrypted)
memberdef.name: linphone_core_create_client_group_chat_room_2

briefdescription.para: Create a client-side group chat room.

detaileddescription.para: When calling this function the chat room is only created at the client-side and is empty. You need to call linphone_chat_room_add_participants() to create at the server side and add participants to it. Also, the created chat room will not be a one-to-one chat room even if linphone_chat_room_add_participants() is called with only one participant.

parameterdescription.para: The subject of the group chat room
Boolean value telling whether we should plan on being able to fallback to a basic chat room if the client-side group chat room creation fails
Boolean value telling whether we should apply encryption or not on chat messages sent and received on this room.

simplesect.para: The newly created client-side group chat room.

briefdescription.para: Used to receive a chat message when using async mechanism with IM enchat_roomyption engine.
Mark all messages of the conversation as read.

parameterdescription.para: The LinphoneChatRoom object corresponding to the conversation.

briefdescription.para: Enable or disable the ephemeral message feature in the chat room.

detaileddescription.para:
Works only for flexisip-based chat room. An ephemeral message will automatically disappear from the sender and recipient's chatrooms after a specified timeout configurable with linphone_chat_room_set_ephemeral_lifetime(). The timer starts when the message has been displayed at the recipent, which means:
at recipient side when linphone_chat_room_mark_as_read() is called.
at sender side, when the message enters the state LinphoneChatMessageStateDisplayed (when receiving the displayed IMDN).

parameterdescription.para: TRUE if the ephemeral message feature is enabled, FALSE otherwise.

briefdescription.para: Returns whether or not the ephemeral message feature is enabled in the chat room.

parameterdescription.para: The LinphoneChatRoom object corresponding to the conversation

simplesect.para: TRUE if ephemeral is enabled, FALSE otherwise.

briefdescription.para: Set lifetime (in seconds) for all new ephemeral messages in the chat room.

detaileddescription.para:
After the message is read, it will be deleted after "time" seconds.
linphone_chat_room_ephemeral_enabled()
chat_room
LinphoneChatRoom object
time
The ephemeral lifetime, default is 0 (disabled)
A value of "time" equal to 0 disables ephemeral messages

briefdescription.para: Get lifetime (in seconds) for all new ephemeral messages in the chat room.

detaileddescription.para:
After the message is read, it will be deleted after "time" seconds.
linphone_chat_room_ephemeral_enabled()
chat_room
LinphoneChatRoom object
the ephemeral lifetime (in secoonds)

briefdescription.para: Set the ephemeral mode of the chat room.

simplesect.para: This function only changes the mode of ephemeral messages LinphoneChatRoomEphemeralMode. It is required to manually enable ephemeral messages after setting the mode by calling linphone_chat_room_enable_ephemeral()

briefdescription.para: Get the ephemeral mode of the chat room.

simplesect.para: the ephemeral mode LinphoneChatRoomEphemeralMode

briefdescription.para: Uses linphone spec to check if all participants support ephemeral messages.

detaileddescription.para:
It doesn't prevent to send ephemeral messages in the room but those who don't support it won't delete messages after lifetime has expired.
linphone_chat_room_ephemeral_enabled()
chat_room
LinphoneChatRoom object
TRUE if all participants in the chat room support ephemeral messages, FALSE otherwise

The last message of the range to be retrieved. History oldest message has index of history size - 1 (use linphone_chat_room_get_history_size() to retrieve history size)

briefdescription.para: Add a listener in order to be notified of LinphoneChatRoom events.

Once an event is received, registred LinphoneChatRoomCbs are invoked sequencially.

simplesect.para: LinphoneChatRoomParams

briefdescription.para: Acquire a reference to the chat room parameters.

simplesect.para: The same LinphoneChatRoomParams object.

briefdescription.para: Release reference to the chat room params.
Returns whether the given parameters are valid or not.

simplesect.para: TRUE if the given parameters are valid, FALSE otherwise

briefdescription.para: Get the backend implementation of the chat room associated with the given parameters.

simplesect.para: the LinphoneChatRoomBackend

briefdescription.para: Get the encryption implementation of the chat room associated with the given parameters.

simplesect.para: the LinphoneChatRoomEncryptionBackend

briefdescription.para: Get the group chat status of the chat room associated with the given parameters.

simplesect.para: TRUE if group chat is enabled, FALSE if one-to-one

briefdescription.para: Get the ephemeral message mode of the chat room associated with the given parameters.

simplesect.para: the ephemeral message mode LinphoneChatRoomEphemeralMode

briefdescription.para: Set lifetime (in seconds) for all new ephemral messages in the chat room.

detaileddescription.para:
After the message is read, it will be deleted after "time" seconds.
linphone_chat_room_params_ephemeral_enabled()
params
The LinphoneChatRoomParams object.
time
The ephemeral lifetime, default is disabled (0)

briefdescription.para: Get lifetime (in seconds) for all new ephemeral messages in the chat room.

detaileddescription.para:
After the message is read, it will be deleted after "time" seconds.
linphone_chat_room_params_ephemeral_enabled()
params
The LinphoneChatRoomParams object.
the ephemeral lifetime (in seconds)

briefdescription.para: Get the encryption status of the chat room associated with the given parameters.

simplesect.para: TRUE if encryption is enabled, FALSE otherwise

briefdescription.para: Get the real time text status of the chat room associated with the given parameters.

simplesect.para: TRUE if real time text is enabled, FALSE otherwise

briefdescription.para: Set the backend implementation of these chat room parameters.
Set the encryption backend implementation of these chat room parameters.
Enables or disables group chat for the chat room associated with the given parameters.

parameterdescription.para: TRUE to enable group chat, FALSE to disable (resulting in one-to-one chat room)

briefdescription.para: Enables or disables forcing of ephemeral messages for the chat room associated with the given parameters.
Enables or disables encryption for the chat room associated with the given parameters.

parameterdescription.para: TRUE to enable encryption, FALSE to disable.

briefdescription.para: Enables or disables real time text for the chat room associated with the given parameters.

parameterdescription.para: TRUE to enable real time text, FALSE to disable.

briefdescription.para: Get the subject of the chat room.

simplesect.para: The subject.

briefdescription.para: Set the subject of the chat room.
Instant messaging
